-h|--help: --- show this help message and exit
-v|--verbose: --- Print more information about what is happening in flake8.
--append-config: --- Provide extra config files to parse in addition to the files found by Flake8 by default.
--config: --- Path to the config file that will be the authoritative config source.
--version: --- show program's version number and exit
-q|--quiet: --- Report only file names, or nothing. This option is repeatable.
--count: --- Print total number of errors and warnings to standard error and set the exit code to 1 if total is not empty.
--diff: --- Report changes only within line number ranges in the unified diff provided on standard in by the user.
--extend-exclude: --- Comma-separated list of files or directories to add to the list of excluded ones.
--filename: --- Only check for filenames matching the patterns in this comma-separated list.
--stdin-display-name: --- The name used when reporting errors from code passed via stdin.
--format: --- Format errors according to the chosen formatter.
--hang-closing: --- Hang closing bracket instead of matching indentation of opening bracket's line.
--per-file-ignores: --- A pairing of filenames and violation codes that defines which violations to ignore in a particular file.
--max-line-length: --- Maximum allowed line length for the entirety of this run.
--max-doc-length: --- Maximum allowed doc line length for the entirety of this run.
--indent-size: --- Number of spaces used for indentation
--extend-select: --- Comma-separated list of errors and warnings to add to the list of selected ones.
--show-source: --- Show the source generate each error or warning.
--enable-extensions: --- Enable plugins and extensions that are otherwise disabled by default
--exit-zero: --- Exit with status code "0" even if there are errors.
-j|--jobs: --- Number of subprocesses to use to run checks in parallel.
--benchmark: --- Print benchmark information about this run of Flake8
--bug-report: --- Print information necessary when preparing a bug report
--doctests: --- also check syntax of the doctests
--include-in-doctest: --- Run doctests only on these files
--exclude-from-doctest: --- Skip these files when running doctests
